sqlMap.sql:
SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_SET_ID , A.PRJ_SET_TARGET , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00017', A.PRJ_SET_TARGET, '1') AS PRJ_SET_TARGET_NM , A.PRJ_SET_NM , A.PRJ_SET_DESC , A.DEFAULT_VAL , CASE WHEN A.VAL_TYPE='03' THEN SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, A.MST_CD, NVL(B.PRJ_SET_VAL, A.DEFAULT_VAL), '1') ELSE NVL(B.PRJ_SET_VAL, A.DEFAULT_VAL) END AS PRJ_SET_VAL_NM , A.VAL_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00015', A.VAL_TYPE, '1') AS VAL_TYPE_NM , A.MST_CD , A.ORD , NVL(B.USE_CD, A.USE_CD) AS USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', NVL(B.USE_CD, A.USE_CD), '1') AS USE_CD_NM , TO_CHAR(NVL(B.REG_DTM, A.REG_DTM), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(NVL(B.REG_DTM, A.REG_DTM), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , NVL(B.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_ID) AS REG_USR_ID , NVL(B.REG_USR_IP, A.REG_USR_IP) AS REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(NVL(B.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_DTM), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , TO_CHAR(NVL(B.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_DTM), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DTM_DAY , NVL(B.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_ID) AS MODIFY_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO( NVL(B.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_ID) , '1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM , NVL(B.MODIFY_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_USR_IP) AS MODIFY_USR_IP
, B.LIC_GRP_ID , B.PRJ_GRP_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(B.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM , B.PRJ_ID , NVL(B.PRJ_SET_VAL, A.DEFAULT_VAL) AS PRJ_SET_VAL
FROM (SELECT * FROM PRJ1200) A LEFT JOIN PRJ1201 B ON ( A.PRJ_SET_ID = B.PRJ_SET_ID AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRJ_SET_TARGET = #searchTargetData#
AND A.PRJ_SET_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY A.ORD
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PRJ_SET_ID = #prjSetId# ORDER BY T1.ORD ASC
sqlMap.update: INSERT INTO PRJ1201 ( PRJ_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_SET_ID , PRJ_SET_VAL , USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #prjId# , #prjGrpId# , #licGrpId# , #prjSetId# , #prjSetVal# , #useCd# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )

UPDATE PRJ1201 A SET PRJ_SET_VAL = #prjSetVal# , USE_CD = #useCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_SET_ID = #prjSetId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
